text: Les Achards is a commune in the department of Vendée, western France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by merger of the former communes of La Mothe-Achard (the seat) and La Chapelle-Achard.Arrêté préfectoral 30 September 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Vendée department == References == Category:Communes of Vendée Category:States and territories established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in France
title: Les Achards
